flawed_nl_solution:
The cypress trees will earn Gloria 20 trees * $100/tree = $<<20*100=20000>>20000
From the sale of the cypress trees, Gloria will also make 600 trees * $200/tree = $<<600*200=120000>>120000
Finally, the maple trees will bring in 24 trees * $300/tree = $<<24*300=7200>>7200
Combining all the amounts will give Gloria a total of $150 + $20000 + $120000 + $7200 = $<<150+20000+120000+7200=147350>>147350
Subtracting the cost of the mountain cabin from the total will leave Gloria with a balance of $147350 - $129000 = $<<147350-129000=18350>>18350

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2000, not 20000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
